name: Hill Dirt Master 3
description:
***NO IN-APPS, NO HIDDEN ADS, ONLY VIDEO ADS FOR MYSTERY BOX!***

Experience thrills of off-road racing by Hill Dirt Master 3. Large selection of challenges and upgradeable parts offer you a varied racing experience.

Features:
• 14 upgradeable parts
• 500+ various stages
• Cool graphics
• Smooth physics
• Various race modes

Race Modes:
• Time Trial - reach the finish within time limitation
• Soccer Balls - push balls to the finish within time limitation
• Gentle Push - push golf car to the finish within time limitation
• Rocket Attack - avoid rockets and reach the finish within time limitation
• Balloon Collector - collect 3 balloons and reach the finish within time limitation
